alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 9:34AM PST until December 25 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix of snow and freezing rain. Snow accumulation up to one inch and ice accumulation up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and northeast and southeast Oregon, including Interstate 84. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow and ice accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
